txt.en: 'Welcome. We are pleased to offer you the experience of playing a chicken in Middle-earth. You will have the freedom to move about The Shire unhindered.\n\n'Simply speak with me again to begin your time as a chicken.'
'Prepare yourself for the adventure of a lifetime. Life through the eyes of a chicken.'
Why Did You Cross the Road?

Life is pretty simple as a chicken, you have your place in the pecking order. Feed is cheep...err cheap and your only job is to not break a few eggs.\n\nSo why would you cross the road? Time for you to answer that age old question.
Speak with the ranger to become a chicken!
Speak again to the ranger within this room and make your way through the world as a chicken.
Speak with the ranger to complete the quest.
Speak with the ranger to complete the quest.
